mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from parking_space
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into parking_space (id, parking_id, parking_space_id, parking_space_status, longitude, latitude, position_geo_hash, gmt_create, gmt_update, deleted) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parkingId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{parkingSpaceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parkingSpaceStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{positionGeoHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtUpdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT})
